Dialogue: I know a spell when I see one... Snape wasn't blinking.
Sir, the second task is only hours away.
Look at you playing with your cards. Pathetic! Exams are coming.
This is a Time Turner Harry.
I've always heard Hogwarts exams were frightful...
A Patronus requires a powerful wizard.
The Chamber of Secrets has been opened... written in blood.
Harry, no way! ... You don't even know how to fly. What an idiot.
Divination is woolly; Ancient Runes is fascinating.
Ron's right Harry. You're gonna need your strength today.
McGonagall is worried. All the teachers are.
We're to be given quills with anti-cheating spells.
Ow! You stood on my foot!
I can't believe it—she's done it again...
Fudge is coming. Why aren't we leaving?
It's Snape! He's jinxing the broom!
Dean was told by Parvati... Hagrid's looking for you.
The Heir of Slytherin has returned... who is it?
Honestly, don't you two read? Philosopher's Stone is a legendary substance...
Sirius will want to hear about this.
Pleasure. You two better change into your robes... You've got dirt on your nose.
There's a reason those curses are unforgivable.
I don't like this. Not at all.
Curious. I've never seen birds like these.
No Ron, you can't! There must be another way!
At least no one on the Gryffindor team had to buy their way in.
There must be 1000 keys up there!
Books and cleverness? There are more important things.
Do what I say. Trust me.
I've read about those. When the smoke turns red, it means you've forgotten something.
I know. But it's the only plan we've got.
These tasks are brutal... I'm scared for you.
How did it go Hagrid? The hearing?
I won't be going alone—someone asked me.
We must make sure Crabbe and Goyle can't interrupt.
It was cat hair. Look at my face!
You don't use your eyes, do you? Didn't you see what it was standing on?
I went looking for the troll... I'd probably be dead.
Do you mind me trying? The Grim possibly.
These tasks test you brutally... I'm scared.
We know the truth. Please believe us.
Ronald would like me to tell you...
If you two don't mind... killed or worse, expelled!
Are you alright? You must be freezing!
You foul loathsome evil little cockroach!
It was standing on a trap door... guarding something.
You hear a voice... then Mrs. Norris ends up Petrified.
Dumbledore couldn't be fooled by an age potion.
Don't forget to give Professor Longbottom our best.
